subject: Order number : #SSN3682
description_text:
Hello,
I am contacting you regarding the following order: #SSN3682

I received an email from UPS indicating an arrival date of November 24, 2025.

However, the destination shown is:
SAINT-IGNY-DE-ROCHE, FR FR instead of CHELLES.

Can you please confirm that you have indeed sent the package to the correct address on the order: 70 QUAI DES MARINIERS 77500 CHELLES?

Thank you so much
